name: Steve RPG
summary: Steve RPG is an unofficial RPG where you play as Minecraft Steve on a mission to destroy villages. One day, Steve encounters a villager named Purble Drank - his drank is also purble - and takes a swig of his drank. Unfortunately, due to... methods, the drank was unstable. Steve wakes up to finding his most prized possession, an unnamed sword made out of an unnamed material, gone to the wind. This sparks Steve to destroy villagers and their villages. You gain several allies to rampage through several villages, becoming unstoppable.
